home.title: zhiva.ai
home.subTitle: Democratization of AI for medical imaging
home.productsTitle: Support your diagnosis with machine learning solutions for medical imaging.
home.productsDesc: Use one of the models provided by our partners. Verify that your decision is consistent with the predictions of the machine learning model. Use a visualization tool to understand the reasoning behind the model.

perks.title: DICOMs in a browser
perks.description: View DICOMs directly in your web browser, without the need to install anything.

perks.title: Share DICOMs
perks.description: Easily share DICOM images with other clinicians and patients by simply sending them a link.

perks.title: AI assistant
perks.description: Accelerate your work by using AI algorithms available on our platform.
